item.description: Come mingle and see great pictures from an October Israel tour. Join other singles for a fun evening. Bring an appetizer or dessert to share, dress casual. To reserve, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 35 Anthony Drive: I-84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 1 (Rt. 177), right onto North Washington St., at 2nd light left onto Northwest Dr., at end right onto Camp St., left onto O'Sullivan Dr., at end turn right to stop, left onto Brace Ave., left onto Anthony Drive.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles House Party - Israel Tour
